name: Sitting with David for a dialogue
description: This is not a chair. This is not black and white. If you look closely you can repair thousands of shades of gray, spread over thousands of pixels. Thousands of directions to look at, starting from yours and thousands of other points of view. A reverse perspective that opens up just like the legs of this non-chair. A non-chair that doesn't point to a single vanishing point. An imperfect and transitory non-chair, like life, like art, decentralized. www.mauriciomessa.com.br 2020 Dimens: 3886 × 5829
